title: Alien Conquest
description: Cassidy Hamilton doesn’t think life can get any worse after being sequestered in a convent on Europa. A Kalquorian invasion changes her mind in a hurry, and she barely eludes her people’s greatest enemy. Fear and desire become a heady mixture when her spying reveals the aliens’ intentions for Europa’s bondage and seduction.  “This title is a reissue of the 1st. Edition.”   12/13/2013  Mid-Novel Word 64,729  Futuristic Romance  Erotica, Mild BDSM. Captive situation/forced seduction, multiple sexual partners.
author: Tracy St. John
